attributes.action: Stop Ealing Council fining innocent motorists in Ealing Broadway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of people dropping off and collecting at Ealing Broadway Station are being fined £50 by a hidden camera for stopping either in the road or on the edge of a pedestrian crossing.

The entrance to the lay-by in front of the station has been coned off and is inaccessible.  Being a one-way street, motorists have no choice but to then pull over further up the road by the crossing.  There are no signs warning motorists not to stop and nothing to warn them of a camera presence.

Whilst violent crime is constamtly rising in Ealing and other Boroughs, our Councils are still persecuting the motorists!
